channel.title: Kingsfield Church Video Podcast
channel.description: This Video Podcast presents messages form the weekend services of Kingsfield Church. For more information visit www.kingsfieldchurch.org
channel.itunes:summary: Kingsfield is non-denominational Christian church in Orange County. Connecting people to life in Christ. Visit our website for more information at www.kingsfieldchurch.org. Also, be sure to check out Kingsfield's Audio Podcast.
